resources.string:
Look in the manifest for the 2 intents that invoke this app

com.example.custom_intent.YOUR_ACTION
android.intent.action.SEND
Uninstall this application to stop responding to these intents and appearing in the EMAIL chooser

You can get here 2 ways, by explicitly asking for the action com.example.custom_intent.YOUR_ACTION. Or by requesting Android to provide an email handler. I cannnot handle email even though my manifest says otherwise.
